annonsrubrik: Ledigt jobb som UX & Merchandising Specialist till Samsung
annonstext:
Are you on the lookout for a job that combines UX design and marketing? You have found the right place! Experis is looking for a UX & Merchandising Specialist to a consultant mission to Samsung. We are looking for you who have previous experience within UX design and marketing as well as experience in tools such as SEO, google analytics, databases and coding. This is a log term consultant mission that starts as soon as possible. We look forward to your application!

When: As soon as possible 
 How long: To April 2023
 Where: Stockholm

About the job:

Working for the world's largest brand and manufacturer, your responsibility is to ensure the Samsung.com touchpoints meet expectations for consumers to discover, choose and purchase products in the Home Appliances or TV/AV product categories.

In this role, you will plan, execute and follow up key activities for product launches, campaigns and always-on communication across the Samsung.com sites in Sweden, Denmark, Norway and Finland. You will plan and develop sales driven merchandising to package and present relevant products, upsell and cross-sell offerings for the product category.

In this role you will be the go-to-person for marketing team, Product Managers and Digital team. Continuously analyzing consumer behavior, you will work closely with the analytics, CRO, SEO and other functions in the digital team to evaluate and identify insights and opportunities to drive the performance for your product category.

Your Key responsibilities with include:

 * .com User Experience.
 * Presenting and positioning the categories/products to meet consumer expectations, in all steps of the consumer journey on Samsung.com.
 * Ensure product and category content are registered and published on time and in-line with .com calendar and best practices.
 * Identify opportunities for site enhancements through analytics to deliver a best practice user experience.
 * Merchandising - plan and execute merchandising for product category. Ensure product recommendations and offering visibility in relevant .com touchpoints to drive sales on .com e-store.
 * Reviews - generate consumer reviews and ensure best possible exposure to drive engagement and purchase intent.
 * Campaign - planning and execution of commercial and branding campaigns. Building of best practice landing pages and user journeys.
 * Agency management - brief web/creative/translation agencies on launches campaigns. Ensure deliverables and timelines are met.

Your profile

We are looking for a person with experience from working with online web production and an ability to identify and apply Consumer Insights and UX best practices as well as turning digital marketing statistics into simple, effective and actionable guidance. 

Formal requirements:

 * 3 years of experience within UX and Marketing
 * Experience and IT knowledge in of Adobe Photoshop/Illustrator/CS, online database and coding
 * Experience in Adobe/Google Analytics
 * MS Office, mainly Excel, PPT
 * Project Management excellence
 * Fluent in at least one Nordic language, plus English. Norwegian, Danish and Finnish is a merit.

What can we offer you as a consultant at Experis?

As a consultant at Experis we are happy to offer you the opportunity to develop your knowledge within different fields of IT, at some of Sweden's leading companies. At Experis we are very proud of our consultants and together we find the right career-paths and challenges for you!

We do have high expectations on you, and in return we offer you great possibilities and opportunities in your work-life. We work together by setting plans for you on how we can collaborate for you to reach your own personal goals and develop professionally.

 

Contact and application:

Please send in your CV as soon as possible through the link on the page. We do not accept applications through e-mail, but should you have questions about the job or the role as a consultant at Experis, please feel free to contact Talent Acquisition Specialist Viktoria Vershovsky at  EMAIL
